user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my friend who loves to travel. Can you fetch the current exchange rate from USD to EUR, GBP, and JPY? Furthermore, suggest other available quotes for currency exchange.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current exchange rate from USD to EUR.
Fetch the current exchange rate from USD to GBP.
Fetch the current exchange rate from USD to JPY.
Suggest other available quotes for currency exchange.
